sec.p: Of all the formulations, F3 formulation showed highest EE% (90.1 Â± 4.1%). As shown in Table 2, S/T 40 formulations, compared to S/T 60, significantly have higher EE% ( P < 0.05). In addition, increasing the amount of Chol from 30 to 50, molar ratios significantly increased ( P < 0.05) the EE% in all nMEO formulations.
